content: from right side of last row attach yarn in it chain 4 2 treble_crochet st in same st 2 treble_crochet in next st chain 4 slip_stitch in same st cut yarn and fasten_off weave in yarn ends cut yarn and fasten_off cathyren© this pattern is copyrighted it is for personal use only you may not rewrite resell or trade it page 3 round tail fins a+ach yarn in middle of round 7 or 8 count 6th st from right side of last chain 3 work 3 double_crochet in same st chain 3 slip_stitch row attach yarn in it in same st cut yarn fasten_off weave yarn ends chain 3 2 double_crochet in same st ch3 slip_stitch in same st ch3 2 double_crochet in next st chain 3 slip_stitch in in same st cut yarn and fasten_off weave yarn ends in work same on the other side of fish pay a+endon both fins are symmetry weave in all yarn ends cathyren© this pattern is copyrighted it is for personal use only you may not rewrite resell or trade it page 4 eyes or sew a pair of small black bu+ons as eyes or glue a pair of wiggling eyes at your choice use sewing needle with black yarn make a french knot in middle of round 3 on each side of fish done cathyren© this pattern is copyrighted it is for personal use only you may not rewrite resell or trade it page 5
